review: It is easy to use and has a low profile.
author: John Mierau

review: I like the devices I'am enjoying now my neflix in my bedroom at night. Before I can watch only in my living room. Plus too many option I can select to watch. Thank you.
author: Enercita F. nacorda

review: Not quite as user friendly as Apple TV yet.Good for gaming with controller. This plus the price make it a great value.Prime video is good but it's hard to find things due to the UI.
author: Evan

review: Works well. Surprised to see that it has to be plugged in for power.
author: Aaron V Witkowski
